changeSet.author: admin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( user_id int PRIMARY KEY, first_name nvarchar(64), last_name nvarchar(64), email nvarchar(255), password nvarchar(64), education text, experience text, contacts nvarchar(24) );

changeSet.author: admin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE company ( company_id int PRIMARY KEY, company_name tinytext, industry tinytext, website nvarchar(64), description text, contacts text, socials text, company_url_path text, company_img_path text );

changeSet.author: admin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE program ( program_id int PRIMARY KEY, company_id int, title nvarchar(64), -- descriptions short_description text, description text, responsibilities text, offers text, -- requirements knowledge_needed text, experience_needed text, work_schedule text, requirements text, -- need to know duration text, location text, work_place text, nr_positions int, salary text, -- other deadline date, review_count int, img_path text, program_url_path text, FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES company(company_id) );

changeSet.author: admin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE review ( review_id int PRIMARY KEY, user_id int, program_id int, rating_stars tinyint, review_text text, review_date date, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id), FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES program(program_id) );

changeSet.author: admin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE notification ( notification_id int PRIMARY KEY, user_id int, notification_content text, timestamp datetime, status nvarchar(8), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) );

changeSet.author: admin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE chat ( chat_id int PRIMARY KEY, user_id int, company_id int, message text, time_stamp datetime, status nvarchar(16), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id), FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES company(company_id) );

changeSet.author: admin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE bookmark ( bookmark_id int PRIMARY KEY, user_id int, program_id int, bookmark_date datetime, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id), FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES program(program_id) );

changeSet.author: admin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE application ( application_id int PRIMARY KEY, user_id int, program_id int, application_date datetime, status nvarchar(16), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id), FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES program(program_id) );
